conclusion: Preliminary objection rejected (incompatibility);Preliminary objection rejected (non-exhaustion of domestic remedies);Violation of Art. 5-1;Not necessary to examine Art. 18+5-1 and P4-2;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - claim partially rejected;Just satisfaction partially reserved
docname: CASE OF BOZANO v. FRANCE - [Serbian Translation]
